text:
Hi,
I have a chatbot in my wordpress, how can i show only in desktop?

```That's what I'm after! The information is in the property, but it should be a link in the newsletter
That link looks pretty ugly```

good morning i hope someone can help me. we are working for the integration salesforce HubSpot for a customer. we found out some problems in mapping the properties. For example when in SF there is a property with field type formula, in HubSpot when we try to match them it appears as single-line text, and obviously it appears an erro of mismatching. did you find a similar situation and get a solution?

Hello,
I have used the HubSpot form as a newsletter, But i want to reset form field after click on this button as shown in image,
i created form using this field
any one have solution for this
Yeah I have <@U01QVR44MEY>
<@U01P7C5P866> could you print out what the {{ DEAL }} object looks like
<@U2LEJ045D> i have code that works in CMS to list all associated companies, but when i try to apply the same logic in quote HubSpot kills the loop at 1,.  have you bypassed this?
can you post your code <@U01P7C5P866>?
Yeah and just to double check you're using email templates right?

So i have started a few webpages that now need to run under another domain that was just recently setup and connected in HubSpot Domains
Is there a way that i can "move" them? I have been looking under website pages and page settings but i can't find a way to do it...

Hi, <@U04TESECAEL> If your not needing to migrate the page contents and only looking to change the domain of the page you can click ‘Settings’ and then look for ‘Page URL’  and at the end of the page url is a pencil icon. Click that pencil icon and you should be able to change the domain of the page.

correct...So I found a workaround.  Marketing emails allow the variable link passthrough so I have the form send an onboarding email once submitted.  It then enrolls them into a sequence automatically as well.  Not perfect but works well so far.  Just need the first sequence email to send 1 Day after they are enrolled (not automatically)
Yeah that's what I just found out yesterday as well, that sequences templates don't allow for variable link passthrough but yeah that workaround is pretty good
really strange that it's not supported, definitely feels like it should be. Although sequences emails are really meant for smaller and more direct communication so I guess that makes some sense
On one of my clients sites, HubSpots cookie banner that loads in can hurt the LCP score. Anyone have any advice or have a solution for that?
so ist es auf der HP Seite, soll ich das auch so machen?
I think sequences are meant for 1-1 (sent from a personal mailbox) whereas marketing emails are more for mass (sent from HS marketing email system) which is why they allow variable passthrough
yeah for sure, but you can use variables in sequences but just not linked text so that's kinda strange
correct
awesome thanks <@U01QVR44MEY>! Trying to overall get a consensus on whether this approach would be in compliance with GDPR and privacy etc.
Yeah honestly I really don't know but I want to say that if the user has given consent to be emailed by your company it doesn't matter what platform the email is being sent from
I ran into this… try nixing any css transition on the entrance

Hi team,
How to get the index pages list/ total index page *count* on HubSpot.?

I have one custom form on the submit of form it should be redirected to meeting calendar and the meeting form data should be pre populated from the very first form i.e., custom form..
